article_text: The visit to Care Ring, a nonprofit clinic in uptown Charlotte, is part of a “house calls listening tour” for Murthy, a 37-year-old physician who was confirmed Dec.15. This was his fourth stop.

article_metadata.title: Surgeon general makes Charlotte ‘house call’ | The Charlotte Observer

article_summary:
The visit to Care Ring, a nonprofit clinic in uptown Charlotte, is part of a “house calls listening tour” for Murthy, a 37-year-old physician who was confirmed Dec.15.
This was his fourth stop.
